library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=174.768, lat=-36.852, popup="The birthplace of R")






Tab 1Tab 2














library(tidyverse)
ggplot(tibble(x=rnorm(100)) %>%
         mutate(y=2*x^2 +3*x + 1 + rnorm(100))) +
  aes(x=x, y=y) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="gam", formula=y~s(x, k=5))
























library(tidyverse)
ggplot(tibble(x=rnorm(100)) %>%
         mutate(y=2*x^2 +3*x + 1 + rnorm(100))) +
  aes(x=x, y=y) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="gam", formula=y~s(x, k=5))
